tasks.title: Set up PDF parsing module with GPT-4o vision
tasks.description: Implement a PDF parsing module that uses GPT-4o vision capabilities to extract content from IS code PDFs and convert them to structured Markdown format

tasks.title: Create document chunking and metadata extraction system
tasks.description: Implement a system to chunk parsed Markdown documents by clause headers, maintaining ~1000 token chunks with proper metadata

tasks.title: Implement vector embedding generation with OpenAI
tasks.description: Create a module to generate vector embeddings using OpenAI's text-embedding-3-small model for all document chunks

tasks.title: Set up Pinecone vector database integration
tasks.description: Configure Pinecone database for storing and searching vector embeddings with metadata filtering

tasks.title: Build semantic search and retrieval engine
tasks.description: Develop a search engine that performs semantic search across IS code content using vector similarity
